Package com.xebisco.yield

Klasse Transform2D

java.lang.Object
com.xebisco.yield.Transform2D
public class Transform2D extends Object
It represents the position, size, scale, and rotation of a 2D object

  • Konstruktordetails

    • Transform2D

      public Transform2D()

  • Methodendetails

    • translate

      public void translate(Vector2D value)
      This function translates the position by adding a TwoAnchorRepresentation value to it.
      Parameter:
      value - The `TwoAnchorRepresentation` object to translate this `Transform2D` instance position.

    • translate

      public void translate(double x, double y)
      This method translates an object's position by a given x and y value using a TwoAnchorRepresentation.
      Parameter:
      x - The x-coordinate by which the object will be translated.
      y - The y-coordinate by which the object will be translated.

    • scale

      public void scale(double x, double y)
      The function scales the `Transform2D` object using a two-anchor representation.
      Parameter:
      x - The value to scale the object horizontally.
      y - The value to scale the object vertically.

    • scale

      public void scale(Vector2D value)
      The function scales the `Transform2D` object using a two-anchor representation.
      Parameter:
      value - The `TwoAnchorRepresentation` object to scale this `Transform2D` instance.

    • rotate

      public void rotate(double value)
      The function rotates an object by a specified angle around the z-axis.
      Parameter:
      value - The parameter "value" is a double type variable that represents the amount of rotation to be added to the current zRotation value.

    • position

      public Vector2D position()
      This function returns the position of the object.
      Gibt zurück:
      The position of the object.

      public Vector2D scale()

      public Vector2D centerOffset()
